body: A posting by the mother of the victim[ko] has mobilized net users to file an online petition and drawn media attention to a questionable murder case. The mother claimed her daughter was beaten to death while resisting being raped. The police has decided to reinvestigate the case.
original_body: A posting by the mother of the victim[ko] has mobilized net users to file an online petition and drawn media attention to a questionable murder case. The mother claimed her daughter was beaten to death while resisting being raped. The police has decided to reinvestigate the case.
title: South Korean Net users Brought Back a Questionable Murder Case to Police

sentence: A posting by the mother of the victim[ko] has mobilized net users to file an online petition and drawn media attention to a questionable murder case.
The mother claimed her daughter was beaten to death while resisting being raped.
The police has decided to reinvestigate the case.
